item.title: 独家报道：美国能源部长称欧盟可能在一年内退出俄罗斯天然气市场
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）周五告诉路透社记者，欧盟可能在六到十二个月内逐步淘汰俄罗斯天然气，代之以美国液化天然气，美国本周已向欧盟官员传达了这一立场。【原文：The European Union could phase out Russian gas within six to 12 months by replacing it with U.S. liquefied natural gas, and the United States communicated this position to EU officials this week, U.S. energy secretary Chris Wright told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计美联储将在 2025 年的三次会议上全部降息
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周五表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会将在今年的三次会议上全部降息，此前的数据显示，8月份美国消费者物价增幅为七个月来最大。【原文：Morgan Stanley said on Friday it expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in all three of its meetings this year, after data showed U.S. consumer prices increased by the most in seven months in August.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 降息在即，投资者寻求美联储对不稳定劳动力市场的看法
item.description: 投资者将期待美联储在下周的会议上传达其对美国劳动力市场疲软的担忧，他们预计该央行将在九个月来首次降息，以支撑就业。【原文：Investors will look for the Federal Reserve to communicate how worried it is about the flagging U.S. labor market at its meeting next week and they expect the central bank to cut interest rates for the first time in nine months to shore up employment.】

item.title: 中国央行将加强对银行间跨境人民币融资的监管
item.description: 中国央行周五表示，计划加强对银行间跨境人民币融资的监管，并促进人民币的离岸使用。【原文：China's central bank said on Friday it plans to better regulate cross-border yuan financing between banks, and promote offshore use of the Chinese currency.】

item.title: 斯沃琪出售手表，嘲讽特朗普对瑞士征收 39% 的关税
item.description: 瑞士钟表制造商斯沃琪公司开始销售一款表面数字3和9颠倒的特别版手表，这是对唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月对美国从瑞士进口商品征收39%关税的一种戏弄。【原文：Swiss watchmaker Swatch has begun selling a special edition watch with the numbers three and nine reversed on its face in a play on the 39% tariffs President Donald Trump imposed on U.S. imports from Switzerland last month.】

item.title: 华尔街期货小幅回落，指数将实现周线上涨
item.description: 美国三大股指在上一交易日创下历史新高后，华尔街期货周五表现低迷，一周来的经济数据并未缓和美联储降息的预期。【原文：Wall Street futures were subdued on Friday after the three main U.S. indexes hit record highs in the previous session, packing up a week of economic data that did not temper expectations of interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 华尔街为货币市场季度末流动性压力做好准备
item.description: 近几个月来，美国国债发行量激增，减少了金融业的流动性，加剧了投资者对资金市场可能在 9 月份面临挤压的担忧。【原文：A surge in U.S. Treasury bill issuance in recent months has reduced liquidity in the financial sector, stoking investor concerns that funding markets could face a September squeeze.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Kenvue公司首席执行官游说小肯尼迪不要将泰诺列为自闭症病因
item.description: 华尔街日报》周五援引一位熟悉此事的人士的话称，Kenvue 公司临时首席执行官柯克-佩里（Kirk Perry）与小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Kenvue's interim CEO Kirk Perry met Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to try and dissuade him from listing Tylenol as a potential cause of autism in an upcoming report, the Wall Street Journal said on Friday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储的恐惧指数可能指向停滞而非滞胀
item.description: 美联储官员已预计将于下周降息，在最近的数据显示雇佣长期疲软和通胀担忧缓解之后，他们也可能更接近于解决长达数月之久的关于滞胀风险的争论。【原文：Federal Reserve officials, already expected to cut interest rates next week, may also be closer to settling a months-long debate over the risks of stagflation after recent data showed longstanding weakness in hiring and easing inflation concerns.】

item.title: 因转向助力装置可能失灵，中国新鹏将召回 47490 辆 P7+ 电动汽车
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五发表声明称，由于转向助力装置可能失灵，中国电动汽车制造商新鹏将从9月15日起召回47490辆P7+电动轿车。【原文：Chinese electric carmaker Xpeng will recall 47,490 P7+ electric sedans from Sept. 15 due to a potential steering assist failure, the Chinese market regulator said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 韩国表示将为其在美国运营的公司提供明确的签证指南
item.description: 韩国最高安全顾问Wi Sung-lac周五表示，韩国政府将与美国官员进行会谈，以便为在美国运营的韩国公司提供明确的签证指南，并减轻留在美国的工人的担忧。【原文：South Korea's top security adviser Wi Sung-lac said on Friday that the government would talk to U.S. officials in order to provide clear visa guidelines for Korean companies operating there and to ease concerns for workers remaining in the United States.】

item.title: 欧盟铝生产商推动征收 30% 废铝出口税
item.description: 欧盟铝行业正敦促欧盟委员会对废金属出口征收约 30% 的关税，以阻止废金属涌出欧盟，造成国内生产商短缺。【原文：The European Union's aluminium sector is urging the European Commission to impose duties of around 30% on exports of scrap metal to stop it flooding out of the bloc and leaving domestic producers short.】

item.title: 印度认为中国员工撤离不会对富士康造成重大影响
item.description: 印度政府一位高级官员本周表示，富士康在过去几个月命令部分中国员工回国后，印度预计富士康在该国的业务不会受到重大干扰。【原文：India does not expect significant disruption to Foxconn’s operations in the country after the iPhone assembler ordered some employees from China to return home over the past few months, a top Indian government official said this week.】

item.title: 欧盟表示接受微软解决 Teams 平台竞争问题的承诺
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，它已接受微软为解决与 Teams 平台有关的竞争问题而做出的承诺。【原文：The European Commission said on Friday it had accepted commitments offered by Microsoft to address competition concerns related to its Teams platform.】

item.title: 澳大利亚关键矿产公司前往华盛顿
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，包括 Trafigura 旗下 Nyrstar 公司在内的 20 多家澳大利亚重要矿产公司将于下周前往美国，探索合作领域。【原文：More than 20 Australian critical minerals companies including Trafigura unit Nyrstar will head to the U.S. next week to explore areas for collaboration, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，Rivian公司将因高速公路辅助软件问题召回超过2.4万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，由于软件缺陷，Rivian公司将召回2.4万多辆2025年款的R1S和R1T电动汽车，该缺陷可能导致其免提公路辅助系统错误识别引导车辆。【原文：Rivian is recalling over 24,000 of its 2025 model year R1S and R1T electric vehicles due to a software defect that may cause its Hands-Free Highway Assist system to misidentify lead vehicles, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.】

item.title: 新加坡 Carro 公司着眼于并购和进军澳大利亚，准备在澳大利亚两地上市
item.description: 东南亚最大的二手车在线交易市场 Carro 公司首席执行官表示，该公司正在考虑两地上市，并计划最早在下个季度将业务扩展到澳大利亚，同时进行两到三项收购，为两地上市做准备。【原文：Carro, Southeast Asia's largest used-car online marketplace, is weighing a dual listing and plans to bulk up for it by expanding into Australia and pursuing two to three acquisitions as early as the next quarter, its CEO said.】

item.title: 拉里-埃里森联合创办甲骨文公司 48 年后重回巅峰
item.description: 财富》杂志在封面上质疑甲骨文联合创始人拉里-埃里森是否会成为世界首富，而《商业周刊》则宣称埃里森 "又酷了"，并指出 "硅谷的坏小子正在复仇"。【原文：Fortune magazine wondered on its cover whether Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison might become the world's richest person, while BusinessWeek declared Ellison is "cool again," noting that "Silicon Valley's bad boy is having his revenge."】

item.title: 中国投资者看淡康波指数再平衡，继续看好人工智能
item.description: 预计投资者将继续追捧中国康佰康的股票，关键科技指数的洗牌迫在眉睫，可能导致价值超过 10 亿美元的被动抛售，但这不太可能动摇他们对人工智能风向标的信心。【原文：Investors are expected to remain hungry for China's Cambricon shares , with a looming reshuffle in a key tech index that could lead to over $1 billion worth of passive selling unlikely to shake their confidence in the AI bellwether.】

item.title: 中国电信运营商将为 iPhone Air 提供 eSIM 支持
item.description: 据苹果中国公司称，中国三大电信运营商将为苹果 iPhone Air 提供 eSIM 支持。【原文：China's three major telecom operators will provide eSIM support for Apple's iPhone Air, according to Apple China.】

item.title: 乔治-阿玛尼遗嘱指示继承人逐步出售时装品牌或寻求 IPO
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份遗嘱副本显示，已故时装设计师乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）的遗嘱指示继承人在 18 个月内出售意大利时装公司 15%的股份，并在他去世后三到五年内将另外 30%至 54.9%的股份转让给同一买家。【原文：The will of late fashion designer Giorgio Armani instructs heirs to sell a 15% stake in the Italian fashion house within 18 months and later transfer an additional 30% to 54.9% to the same buyer between three and five years after his death, according to a copy of the will reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 台湾推动芯片外交，新老盟友齐聚大型展会
item.description: 本周，全球领先的半导体公司齐聚台北，参加 Semicon 展会，讨论人工智能热潮：台湾利用其在芯片行业的主导地位促进外交目的。【原文：As leading global semiconductor companies gathered in Taipei this week for the Semicon trade show to discuss the AI boom, one area got a much more prominent role than before: Taiwan's use of its dominance of the chip industry to promote diplomatic aims.】

item.title: 意大利火箭制造商阿维奥公司批准增资 4 亿欧元以提高产量
item.description: 意大利火箭制造商阿维奥公司（Avio）周四批准了一项4亿欧元（约合4.6896亿美元）的增资计划，以便在全球航天和国防工业商机无限之际，为扩大生产能力提供资金。【原文：Italian rocket maker Avio approved a 400-million-euro ($468.96 million) capital increase plan on Thursday to finance expanded manufacturing capacity at a time of robust opportunities in the global space and defence industries.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔董事会要求股东拒绝 BBVA 的恶意收购要约
item.description: 周五，西班牙 Sabadell 银行董事会一致建议其股东拒绝 BBVA 的恶意收购要约，此举可能会增加竞争对手提高收购要约的压力。【原文：Spanish bank Sabadell's board unanimously recommended its shareholders reject BBVA's hostile takeover bid on Friday, a move that may add pressure on the rival to increase its offer.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将驳回尼古拉前首席执行官的起诉
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周四提出动议，要求驳回对尼古拉公司（Nikola）创始人兼前首席执行官特雷弗-米尔顿（Trevor Milton）的起诉。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission moved on Thursday to dismiss its case againt Trevor Milton, the founder and former CEO of Nikola, a company that sought to make electric and hydrogen-powered trucks.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，中国陷入政策困境
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）为下周的降息预期做准备之际，中国央行很可能会抵制近期的宽松政策，因为它正处于两难境地：如何支撑疲软的经济，同时又不进一步助长火热的股市。【原文：As the U.S. Federal Reserve gears up for an expected rate cut next week, China's central bank is likely to resist a near-term easing in policy as it grapples with a dilemma: how to shore up a weak economy without further fuelling a hot stock market.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Apple Watch 高血压功能获 FDA 批准，将于下周推出
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司周四获得美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）批准后，将于下周在其智能手表上推出高血压检测功能。【原文：Apple will roll out a hypertension detection feature on its smartwatch next week after receiving U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) clearance on Thursday, Bloomberg News reported.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场呼叫美联储：请给我们五张票
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 政府债务压力如何席卷全球市场
item.description: 从英国到日本，人们对各地政府财政状况的担忧不断升级，迄今为止，这种担忧主要被控制在债券市场内部，但大型投资者正在为压力蔓延到从大型科技到住房和货币等各种资产做好准备。【原文：Escalating fears about government finances everywhere from Britain to Japan have so far been contained mostly within bond markets, but big investors are preparing for stress to spread across assets from big tech to housing and currencies.】

item.title: Via Transportation 及其股东在美国首次公开募股中融资 4.93 亿美元
item.description: 交通技术公司 Via Transportation 周四与一些现有投资者一起在美国首次公开募股中募集了 4.929 亿美元，成为 9 月份新股发行活动反弹的最新一家公司。【原文：Transit tech firm Via Transportation , along with some existing investors, raised $492.9 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Thursday, becoming the latest company to join the rebound in activity for fresh flotations in September.】
